name: Stones Of Istrithe
description:
Lil gambling game based off blackjack for a much larger game.

Stones Of Istrithe is a gambling game which uses blackjack as its inspiration, as you draw gems from the sack you must be prepared whether or not to draw another to ensure your victory over your enemy.

Rules:

- Draw More Than 18 and Lose.

- Draw a Black Gem and Lose.

- Draw a White Gem and Win.

-Score Lower than your enemy and Lose.

-Each Gem has a Different Score.

-Ruby:3 , Emerald:9 , Sapphire:7 , Amethyst:1.
